_comment_server: 'Server' operating mode of interaction with the Agent

server._comment_host: host name/ip address to bind the Twilio webhook to
server._comment_port: port to bind the Twilio webhook to
server._comment_auth_token: Twilio auth token, used to verify webhooks calls

_comment_cli: 'Command line client' operating mode of interaction

ai._comment_ai: Nvidia model catalog API key, used for LLM inference

_comment_implementations: Concrete implementations to use (mock-up vs. actual)

implementations._comment_lm: The AI model to use for the planning Agent. Values: 'lm_mock', 'lm_ngc'.
implementations._comment_vlm: The AI model to use for Vision. Values: 'vlm_mock', 'vlm_hf'
implementations._comment_ocr: The AI model/system to use for OCR. Values: 'ocr_mock', 'ocr_easyocr'
